turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Asokavanam (2001 film).
turn.2: Asokavanam (2001 film) Asokavanam is a 2001 Tamil thriller film written and directed by Thakkali Srinivasan.
turn.4: The film features Sriman, Livingston, Rajashree, and Riyaz Khan in the leading roles, while Master Mahendran and Baby Jennifer appear in supporting roles.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Featuring music composed by Deva, the film was released on 12 October 2001.
turn.7: What did critics say about the film?
turn.8: A reviewer from The Hindu noted "the script is good in the first half but sags in the second", adding "the director has not done much to sustain the viewers' interest or to keep them guessing".
turn.9: What other reviews did the film receive?
turn.10: Balaji Balasubramaniam of BBthots.com wrote the film was "a rare entry in the horror genre, this movie too flatters to deceive" and that "it was a thriller that draws us in with the right setup and has some good ideas but disappoints in its pacing and execution".
